content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Additions and alterations to existing conservation building, and the construction of an eleven-storey residential building with basement car park and communal facilities.
  • Emerald Garden lies in the heart of Chinatown heritage precinct at the border of the Central Business District of Shenton Way and Raffles Place. This 11-storey condominium of 265 units is uniquely fronted by a three-storey conservation building which houses six shop units and serves as the entrance to the condominium.
CLIENT

Oxford Gardens Pte Ltd

LOCATION

Club Street, Singapore

COMPLETION YEAR

1999
